messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
We have a signal 14, possible signal 20F, headed to East University from Cassadaga.
Can you describe the vehicle?
It's an extended cab white Chevy with a ladder sticking out of the back. The driver is Brian Lankford, wearing camo clothing.
Is he armed?
Yes, he mentioned he is Signal Zero with a gun and his license is over.
What is his last known location?
Last seen at 143 Cassadaga Road, possibly headed towards East University.
Copy that. We'll start units in that area.
Thank you. 11 Charlie 71 en route to East University.
Is there another unit that can assist 11 Charlie 71?
One Charlie 60, can Orange City send a unit?
Copy. I'll check. Orange City unit, can you assist?
Yes, 11 Charlie 71 on scene in the area.
Copy that. Do you need additional units?
Yes, 1651 East University, cross street Foothill Farms Road. No units on scene yet.
Copy. We have units en route. Any injuries reported?
Yes, officer injured. He can't see anything, something in his eye, but he's conscious.
Has he been shot?
Unknown. There's a round through the passenger side window.
Make sure he stays covered. Do we know where the shot came from?
Unknown. We need additional support.
All units, proceed with caution. Perimeter needs to be set up around the house. 1651 East University.
Copy. Is Air 1 available?
Already en route. We will notify the district.
Town four. We'll set up at Saxon and I-4.
Is there information on whether shots are coming from the house?
Unknown. 11.0.2 Central, Fish Hospital, en route with officer shot.
Copy. We'll notify the hospital.
